body.name: Office Chair with Footrest-Ergonomic Computer Chair with Extra Lumbar Support Pillow, High Back Executive Desk Chair Thick Bonded Leather, Large Home Office Work Chair with Wide Seat for Comfort-Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 9 hrs

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: ✅【MADE FOR ALL-DAY COMFORT】Our ergonomic office chair is designed with your comfort in mind, allowing you to sit for extended periods of time without any discomfort. The thick and soft leather provides a luxurious feel while offering excellent support. The high back design offers full-body support, while the removable lumbar support pillow provides extra support for your lower back. What's more, the pull-out footrest allows you to take deeper relaxation breaks when you're tired

✅【FIRST-CLASS SEATING EXPERIENCE】This computer chair features a large and soft seat cushion(seat size: 21W" X 18.7D", 5.51" thick) that ensures maximum comfort even during long hours of sitting. The cushion is designed to distribute your weight evenly, reducing pressure points and preventing discomfort

✅【EXTRA LUMBAR SUPPORT PILLOW】Our desk chair is equipped with a removable lumbar support pillow, providing extra support for your lower back. It helps maintain proper posture and reduces the risk of back pain or strain

✅【HIDDEN RETRACTABLE FOOTREST】This executive leather chair is equipped with a convenient footrest, allowing you to relax and take a break whenever you need. It provides extra support for your legs, promoting better blood circulation and reducing fatigue. What's more, it can be flexibly pulled out. When not in use, it can be completely retracted and placed under the chair without taking up extra space

✅【INVEST IN MATERIAL】This office desk chair is upholstered in bonded leather which is resistant to scratches, stains, peeling, and cracking. Linkage armrests provide optimal support for the elbows and lower arms at any angle, more reliable and safer. Heavy duty metal base, weight up to 300lbs

✅【RISK FREE PURCHASE】Complete customer satisfaction is our top priority! If you have any questions about our chairs, please do not hesitate to contact us by email (The contact info is included in the manual), we will spare no effort to assist you to solve any problem! Don't compromise on your comfort, order our comfortable office chair now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COLAMY Ergonomic Office Chair with Footrest and Lumbar Support Pillow Improve your work set-up by starting with this comfortable high-end office chair! Our ergonomic office chair is designed with your comfort in mind, allowing you to sit for extended periods of time without any discomfort. The thick and soft leather provides a luxurious feel while offering excellent support. High backrest offers full-body support, while the removable lumbar pillow provides extra support for your lower back. What's more, the pull-out footrest allows you to take deeper relaxation

ADJUSTABLE HEADREST Fully support your neck and head, meeting different sitting needs LUMBAR SUPPORT PILLOW Provide additional support for the lower back. Make long-term work easier 5.5" THICKEN CUSHION Thicken soft cushion equipped with high-density foam, enjoy a first-class sitting experience LINKAGE ARMRESTS Linkage armrests provide support at ANY angle. More reliable when lying down

ERGONOMIC BACKREST Ergonomic backrest, providing more scientific support for your whole back RETRACTABLE FOOTREST The chair is equipped with a convenient footrest, allowing you to nap and take a break RECLINE FUNCTION The backrest supports angle adjustment, up to 135 °. Suitable for work, reading, napping, resting HEAVY DUTY METAL BASE Weight up to 300lbs. 360° smooth-rolling casters provide solid and silent movement

COLAMY OFFICE CHAIRS Ergonomic Design 5.5 Inch Cushion Thickness 5.3 Inch Lumbar Pillow Lumbar Support Thicken Linkage Arms Armrest Flip-up Arms 90°-135° (Recline) Angle 90°-110° (Rocking) 300 LBS Weight Capacity 300 LBS Hidden Footrest Extra Features Upgraded Casters Ergonomic Design 5.5 Inch Cushion Thickness 5.5 Inch Lumbar Pillow Lumbar Support Thicken Linkage Arms Armrest Flip-up Arms 90°-135° (Recline) Angle 90°-110° (Rocking) 300 LBS Weight Capacity 300 LBS — Extra Features — Ergonomic Design 5.5 Inch Cushion Thickness 5.5 Inch Lumbar Pillow Lumbar Support Thicken Linkage Arms Armrest Flip-up Arms 90°-135° (Recline) Angle 90°-110° (Rocking) 300 LBS Weight Capacity 300 LBS Hidden Footrest Extra Features Diamond Pattern Ergonomic Design 5.5 Inch Cushion Thickness 3.5 Inch Lumbar Pillow Lumbar Support Thicken Linkage Arms Armrest Flip-up Arms 90°-135° (Recline) Angle 90°-126° (Rocking) 300 LBS Weight Capacity 275 LBS Hidden Footrest Extra Features Diamond Pattern

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cool office chair!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this office chair for my office. Very spacious, and wide. Very comfortable, for posture. Easy to put together, took about 30 minutes to assemble. The leather is of very good quality. Adjustable. It’s very convenient to move around on wheels. The quality is superb, and it looks very beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have to adjust the position of the back rest manually whenever you want to recline, sit up, etc. There is a manual lever to lock the seat rest in place that you have to unlock/lock every time, cannot recline without locking into place.Comfortable chair, assembly was easy enough - had some trouble lining up the back rest to the seat.I'm returning it, I move too much in my seat to have to manually adjust every time I move

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and high quality
reviews.reviewText: The size, the quality, the comfort, everything on this is just simply perfect. This definitely a home office chair I was looking for. After changing so many of my home office chairs, I'm gonna keep this one for a long time. Very easy to assemble. Took me less than 30 minutes to get it set up. Sitting on it for an 8 hours shift won't be a problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value for the Price
reviews.reviewText: A good chair for the price. Requires a little effort to assemble but a reasonably handy person can do it.I like it. Will use it to replace my old much more expensive chair that needs retiring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m a cashier and super wants a comfortable chair with footrest at front when I’m tired. Then I found this only and want to give a try. Product is super easy to assemble and very comfortable to sit! Also the material quality is good and reliable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It came exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the material justifies the cost of this chair. It reclines really well and it is super comfortable. Definitely recommended. Came with proper instructions, it took me less than 20 minutes to assemble this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Chair came with most of the parts already assembled. Less than one month later...everything that came already assembled, i.e., arms, plastic arm rails, etc., all broke, split or fell off. This was a very big waste of money. I should have never gotten rid of my old chair. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For my husband's office use
reviews.reviewText: I needed something strong as my husband is over weight but at the same time, something simple and comfortable. I am glad I got this chair as he loves it. it takes his weight and does not creak. It moves easily and rotates with ease. Good buy!
